title: Fuel Update: 95 Octane Petrol available from Tuesday (24)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekera announced that 95 Octane Petrol will be released to nation-wide filling stations from Monday (23).
“With the two cargo vessels unloaded, 95 Petrol stocks will be available for the next 6 weeks,” the Minister tweeted.
He requested those who use 95 Octane Petrol NOT to stay in lines for 92 Octane Petrol, and to obtain the 95 Octane Petrol from Tuesday (24).
